messages.content: comfyui-pixel is a set of pixel art workshop nodes for ComfyUI.
Who was credited for helping with comfyui-pixel?
AstroPulse was credited for providing help and the algorithm for comfyui-pixel.
What repository was referenced in the credits for comfyui-pixel?
The repository https://github.com/Astropulse/pixeldetector/tree/k-centroid-only was referenced in the credits for comfyui-pixel.
